summary: This mod contains my texture resources and adds their content to the game
descriptionHtml:
Phils Textures Standalone
-------------------------

Author
------
PhilSchmidheiny

This mod contains my resource mods and adds their content to the game. 

Ornate Steel Weapons: Craftable with the Steel Smithing Perk.
Ornate Steel Armor: Craftable with the Steel Smithing Perk
Ornate Steel Plate Armor: Craftable with the Advanced Armors Perk

Ornate Wolf Armor: Buyable from Eorlund Gray-Mane. Kodlak Whitemane wears this set now.

Please report any bugs or errors via the comment section as soon as possible.

I will add my future texture resources to this mod as separate download files, so be sure to check every now and then.

Installation
-----------

As usual

Content
-------

Included are the following mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12368]Ornate Steel Armor Texture - Resource by Phil[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12370]Ornate Steel Weapons Texture - Resource by Phil[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12363]Ornate Steel Plate Armor Texture - Resource by Phil[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12584]Ornate Wolf Armor Texture - Resource by Phil[/url]

Please check out those mods for further information and pictures and endorse them if you like the textures

Optional Content:
---------------------

Phils Textures Standalone DV - German Version translated by Elandra

Main File is necessary as the German Version only contains the .esp
author: PhilSchmidheiny
